resources.string: Add a new task to the list
You can\'t delete the last tag,\nbut you can rename it from the menu.\n
The todo list couldn\'t be backed up on the SD card for some reason. Are you sure there\'s an SD card in there?
The todo list couldn\'t be imported for some reason. Are you sure there is a backup on the card, or that an SD card is inserted?
Type a name for the new tag:
Type a new name for the tag:
Type a new name for this task:
You can now type the note. The text box will increase as you type.
Are you sure you want to delete this tag? All the tasks in this tag will be lost.
Are you sure you want to delete all the tasks in this tag? They will be permanently lost.
Are you sure you want to import a backup from the SD card? Your current todo list will be permanently lost.

Tasks are organised into tags, which can be selected in the upper spinner.

To handle tags (creation, deletion, renaming) you can use the general menu.

To create tasks you just need to click the 'Add' button at the bottom. For a task-specific menu, long-click a certain task.

You can also use keyboard shortcuts. Press K now if you want to check them out.

---Task handling:
Next=N, Previous=P
Add=A, Delete=D
Edit or Rename = E or R,
Audio note=F
Graphical note=G
Written note=W
Move to another tag=M
Push down=0
Menu for selected task=SPACE
Show all the tasks=SHIFT+T

---Tag handling:
Same as before (N,P,A,D,R) + ALT
Show all the tags=T
Clear all the tasks=X
1,2,...,9 to open a specific tag

---General:
Help=H, Stats=S
Configuration=C
Change to-do list size limit=O,I
See due tasks only=U
'Ok' or 'Use' or 'Yes'=ENTER
'Cancel' or 'No'=DEL
Draw a note for the task:
Record up to 50s of audio on the SD card
Recording can\'t start :-/\nAre you sure there\'s an SD card in the device?\n
Press here to see the due tasks
January February March April May June July August September October November December

This screen shows you tasks that are due today or earlier.

You can go back to the normal todo list view by pressing 'Go back'.

Also, you can access this screen from the normal view by pressing the U key.

Just letting you know about a feature that you\'re going to see in action soon. There\'s a checked tasks limit which is set to 50 by default. It means the app automatically removes checked tasks so you don\'t have to delete them yourself (there won\'t be more than 50 checked tasks). You can change it by closing this note and pressing O or I.\n\nThis message appeared because the next checked task will reach the limit :)
Confirm (the app will perform an online login and sync all the tasks with due dates)
Login and data synchronization successful. Every time a task with a due date will be added, the app will connect to the internet and add it to the Google Calendar.\n
Although the login was successful, the app wasn't able to synchronize the tasks.\n
For some reason the login failed. Check the username/password and the availability of an internet connection.\n
(experimental) Synchronize tasks with due dates to Google Calendar
Backup todo list on SD card every time the app closes
Visually distinguish tasks by their priority (consumes a bit more resources)
Here, for example, you can add work-related tasks
